descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qlkat6x.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Sbmg3dq.jpg[/img]
(image by godspeed0022's [url=http://robalova.exblog.jp/]Loading......[/url])[/center]
[center][youtube]6YH-uzih-v4[/youtube][youtube]qWx4zNW-4SQ[/youtube]
[color=#ffa07a][b]Big thank to hodilton !! [/b][/color]&[color=#ffa07a][b] [/b][/color][color=#00ffff][b]Thank Seriezs's review !![/b][/color]
[youtube]2RWEHvKC6Po[/youtube]
[color=#daa520][b]Thank to SkyttsTV's review video !![/b][/color][/center]

Hello! My name is [b]YuiH[/b], I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

[b]This is my first time to publish mod.[/b]

*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Sha is one of my character, and I just got how to make the standalone follower, so make this.

[b][color=#ffff00]*Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.*[/color][/b]

[color=#afeeee][size=5][b][Character][/b][/size][/color]
[size=4][color=#00ffff][b]Sha [/b][/color][/size]
She is a master of ice mage.

She is adventurer just came to skyrim, walking around the world with no purpose, no destination and no sense of direction,
always lazy to carry any inventory even the money with herself, many time she fainted on the road because hunger,
she looks like has a fragile health and also can't sleep well at night.

Height 0.98 Weight 100
[b]Location:[/b] Riverwood sleeping giant inn
[b]Default Outfit: [/b]Warlock Robes
[b]Inventory: [/b]Iron Dagger
[b]Combat style: [/b]Destruction Magic
[b]Spell List: [/b]Frost Cloak, Ice Spike, Wall Of Frost, Conjure Frost Atronach, Fast Healing
[b]Perk:[/b] Light Foot, Master Destruction, Deep Freeze, Augmented Frost, Magic Resistance

[color=#afeeee][size=5][b][Recommended Mod][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#afeeee][size=5][b][Change log][/b][/size][/color]
2014.04.10 - Release.
2014.04.11 - ver0.2 fix folder miss
2014.04.11 - ver0.3 fix English esp
2014.04.21 - Change some status
2014.09.24 - ver1.0 (Renewal)
Change character's facial design, Change some status:
Starting with level 30, delete "Ice Storm", won't use CHSBHC now,
change height from 0.97 to 0.98, Increase carry weight.
Comment: [color=#d8d8d8][size=1]Even lost "Ice Storm", I still want her as a powerful mage.
[/size][/color]2014.09.27 - ver1.1 (Renewal) fix some minor problem. Change PC Level Mult from 1.3 to 1.0, now she will stay the same level with player.
